actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Black Lung Benefits Act to provide for equity in the treatment of benefits for eligible survivors.
short_title: Black Lung Benefits Survivors Equity Act of 1999

summary.text: Black Lung Benefits Survivors Equity Act of 1999 - Amends the Black Lung Benefits Act to eliminate the exception (with respect to a claim filed after the effective date of the Black Lung Benefits Amendments of 1981) to the prohibition against requiring eligible survivors of a miner determined to be eligible for black lung benefits to file a new claim or refile or otherwise revalidate the miner's claim.

titles.title: Black Lung Benefits Survivors Equity Act of 1999
To amend the Black Lung Benefits Act to provide for equity in the treatment of benefits for eligible survivors.
